creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: vertical striped woven skirt; blue, peach, pink, red, green and purple solid stripes interspersed with patterned stripes of various widths; patterns of abstract design; bottom panel of skirt 31 inches with top panel of 9 1/2 inches; 25 3/4 in. area (front and back) where abstract designs are closer together
title: Skirt
